BIO

Lois is Certainly a multidisciplinary visionary Metaverse Fashion Designer, who seamlessly blends the worlds of fashion design and software engineering. By harnessing mixed reality and 3D modeling, I craft innovative fashion products that transcend traditional boundaries.
